reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Redemption song: development of the community awarness on migration risks in West Africa

description.narrative: L'obiettivo generale di questo progetto è garantire l'amministrazione efficace dei fondi, il monitoraggio e la valutazione delle attività di sensibilizzazione promosse dal Link2007 in Burkina Faso, Guinea Conakry, Mali, Niger e Senegal. Gli obiettivi specifici del progetto sono: trasferire efficacemente i fondi dei donatori a Link2007 per svolgere le attività descritte al punto 9 in basso in cinque paesi target e monitorare e valutare efficacemente le attività svolte dal partner attuatore

The overall objective of this project is to ensure the effective administration of funds, monitoring and evaluation of awareness raising activities promoted by Link2007 in Burkina Faso, Guinea Conakry, Mali, Niger, and Senegal. The specific objectives of the project are to: effectively transfer donor funds to Link2007 to carry out activities described in point 9 below in five target countries and to effectively monitor and evaluate the activities carried out by the implementing partner

tag.narrative: Encourage and promote effective public, public-private and civil society partnerships, building on the experience and resourcing strategies of partnerships
Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all
Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the global partnership for sustainable development

Take immediate and effective measures to eradicate forced labour, end modern slavery and human trafficking and secure the prohibition and elimination of the worst forms of child labour, including recruitment and use of child soldiers, and by 2025 end child labour in all its forms
